com.paypal.merchant.sdk

Interface CardReaderConnectionListener


  • public interface CardReaderConnectionListener

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onActiveReaderChanged(CardReaderListener.ReaderTypes readerType)
      This method will be called when there is a change in active Reader in case multi card readers are connected.
      void onConnectedReaderNeedsSoftwareUpdate(boolean isUpdateOptional) 
      void onConnectedReaderSoftwareUpdateComplete() 
      void onMultipleCardReadersConnected(List<CardReaderListener.ReaderTypes> connectedReaders)
      This method is used to notify the app/observer if there are more than on card reader is connected.
      void onPaymentReaderConnected(CardReaderListener.ReaderTypes readerType, CardReaderListener.ReaderConnectionTypes transport)
      This method will be called back to indicate that a payment reader has been detected by the SDK.
      void onPaymentReaderDisconnected(CardReaderListener.ReaderTypes readerType)
      This method will be called by the SDK to indicate that a reader previously connected to this device has now become disconnected.

    • Method Detail

      • onPaymentReaderConnected

        void onPaymentReaderConnected(CardReaderListener.ReaderTypes readerType,
                              CardReaderListener.ReaderConnectionTypes transport)
        This method will be called back to indicate that a payment reader has been detected by the SDK. Follow this Reader Work Flow to understand more about when these APIs will be invoked and how to interpret the various error codes and extra information.
        Parameters:
        readerType; - indicates whether this is a magnetic stripe reading device or a more advanced device capable of reading cards with a Chip & PIN.
        transport; - indicates how the reader is connected to this device (bluetooth, audio jack etc).

      • onPaymentReaderDisconnected

        void onPaymentReaderDisconnected(CardReaderListener.ReaderTypes readerType)
        This method will be called by the SDK to indicate that a reader previously connected to this device has now become disconnected. The reader could have been disconnected because the user intentionally did so or because of a weak connection (for ex: weak bluetooth connection).

        Tip: Applications should notify the user of this if this was not something that was expected so that the user can fix any potential connection issues

        Parameters:
        readerType - The type of reader that has disconnected.

      • onConnectedReaderNeedsSoftwareUpdate

        void onConnectedReaderNeedsSoftwareUpdate(boolean isUpdateOptional)

      • onConnectedReaderSoftwareUpdateComplete

        void onConnectedReaderSoftwareUpdateComplete()

      • onMultipleCardReadersConnected

        void onMultipleCardReadersConnected(List<CardReaderListener.ReaderTypes> connectedReaders)
        This method is used to notify the app/observer if there are more than on card reader is connected. Application can choose one of the connected reader as active reader.
        Parameters:
        connectedReaders - list of readers which are currently connected.

      • onActiveReaderChanged

        void onActiveReaderChanged(CardReaderListener.ReaderTypes readerType)
        This method will be called when there is a change in active Reader in case multi card readers are connected.
        Parameters:
        readerType - ActiveReader which is being used
